item.title: First_post
item.author: xja
item.description: 使用主题：LoveIt 搭建参考：Theme Documentation - Basics 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 git clone https://github.com/xja/xja.github.io hugo new site xja.github.io --force cd xja.github.io git submodule add https://github.com/dillonzq/LoveIt.git themes/LoveIt hugo new posts/first_post.zh-cn.md git add . git commit -m "First post" git push
